title: Welshpool: Appeal after man found unconscious in street
article: A man is in a critical condition in hospital after being found unconscious in a street. Dyfed-Powys Police said the man, who is in his 40s, was on a junction between Berriew Street and Broad Street, Welshpool, early on Sunday. He left the Angel pub at about 01:00 GMT and was found about 30 minutes later. Officers have appealed for anyone who was in the Berriew Street area around that time to provide information.
